name: CIS_EKS_v1.1.0 - 3.2.7
title: Ensure that the --make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true
script:
function parse_yaml {
   local prefix=$2
   local s='[[:space:]]*' w='[a-zA-Z0-9_]*' fs=$(echo @|tr @ '\034')
   sed -ne "s|^\($s\):|\1|" \
        -e "s|^\($s\)\($w\)$s:$s[\"']\(.*\)[\"']$s\$|\1$fs\2$fs\3|p" \
        -e "s|^\($s\)\($w\)$s:$s\(.*\)$s\$|\1$fs\2$fs\3|p"  $1 |
   awk -F$fs '{
      indent = length($1)/2;
      vname[indent] = $2;
      for (i in vname) {if (i > indent) {delete vname[i]}}
      if (length($3) > 0) {
         vn=""; for (i=0; i<indent; i++) {vn=(vn)(vname[i])("_")}
         printf("%s%s%s=%s\n", "'$prefix'",vn, $2, $3);
      }
   }'
}

make_iptables_arg=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-make\-iptables\-util\-chains=[^ ]*' | cut -d= -f2)
if [ -n "$make_iptables_arg" -a "$make_iptables_arg" == "true" ]; then
  exit 0
elif [ -n "$make_iptables_arg" -a "$make_iptables_arg" != "true" ]; then
  echo "CIS EKS 3.2.7 - Ensure that make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true."
  exit 1
elif [ -z "$make_iptables_arg" ]; then
  make_iptables_arg=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-make\-iptables\-util\-chains [^ ]*' | cut -d' ' -f2)
  if [ -n "$make_iptables_arg" -a "$make_iptables_arg" == "true" ]; then
    exit 0
  elif [ -n "$make_iptables_arg" -a "$make_iptables_arg" != "true" ]; then
    echo "CIS EKS 3.2.7 - Ensure that make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true."
    exit 1
  fi
fi

file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config=[^ ]*' | cut -d= -f2)
if [ -z $file_path ]; then
    file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config [^ ]*' | cut -d' ' -f2)
    if [ -z $file_path ]; then
        echo "File Not Found"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

if [ -f $file_path ]; then
  if [[ $file_path == *"yaml"* ]]; then
    data=$(parse_yaml $file_path)
    make_iptable_util=$(grep "^makeIPTablesUtilChains=" <<< "$data" | cut -d= -f2-)
    if [ -z $make_iptable_util ]; then
      make_iptable_util=null
    fi
  elif [[ $file_path == *"json"* ]]; then
    make_iptable_util=$(jq '.makeIPTablesUtilChains' $file_path)
  fi
  if [ $make_iptable_util != "false" ]; then
    exit 0
  else
    echo "EKS CIS 3.2.7 - Ensure that makeIPTablesUtilChains is set to true in the kubelet config file"
    exit 1
  fi
fi
